text: Nani azali moto mabe koleka oyo apesi mokongo na bilembo bia Nkolo waye tango bazali koteya ye yango,, mpe abosani maye maboko (mibale) naye masalaki? Tozipi mitema mia bango ete basosola te, (bayeba kososolo kurani te) mpe matoyi na bango makangami, тре soki obengi bango na bokambami, bakokambama soki токе te
